General.Name: Ferrum SA de Ceramica y Metalurgia
General.Description: Ferrum S.A. de Cerámica y Metalurgia manufactures and sells sanitary ware products in Argentina and internationally. It offers toilets, bidets, deposits, touchless deposits, bidet and toilet covers, active lids, potholes, bathtubs, island bathtubs, shower boxes, screens, receptacles, whirlpools, bathroom accessories, whirlpool accessories, accessories for partitions, barrales and others, first aid kits, mirrors, vanities, laundry, kitchen sink, urinals, special lavatories, and specific use toilets. Ferrum S.A. de Cerámica y Metalurgia was founded in 1911 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
